main event: On 9 August 1965, three objects were sighted over Montrose, Colorado, appearing very bright and moving silently.
interesting points: The objects hovered for a brief period before continuing on their course., The witness reported that the objects looked much brighter than a star or planet., The sighting lasted for about 4 minutes and 25 seconds., Initial evaluation suggested that the quality of data was questionable but noted the objects might have been aircraft., The shapes of the objects were described as round or oval.
witness description: a civilian who saw the objects in the night sky
